languages.text: {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} and {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g} increase the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of this bolter by the number of enemies affected by {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}.
languages.original_text: Боевой гимн и Яростное выступление повышают {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g} этого болтера на число противников, на которых действует Боевой гимн или Яростное выступление.

traits.locale_text: War Hymn increases the rate of fire of this bolter by the number of enemies affected by War Hymn.
War Hymn and Furious Recital increase the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of this bolter by the number of enemies affected by War Hymn or Furious Recital.
War Hymn and Furious Recital increase the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of this bolter by the number of enemies affected by War Hymn or Furious Recital.

languages.text: Боевой гимн и Яростное выступление повышают {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g} этого болтера на число противников, на которых действует Боевой гимн или Яростное выступление.
languages.original_text: War Hymn and Furious Recital increase the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of this bolter by the number of enemies affected by War Hymn or Furious Recital.

traits.locale_text: Боевой гимн повышает скорострельность этого болтера на число противников, на которых действует Боевой гимн.
Боевой гимн повышает скорострельность этого болтера на число противников, на которых действует Боевой гимн.

languages.text: {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}战争礼赞{/g}与{g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}愤怒颂歌{/g}会提高这把爆矢枪的{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}，等同于受{g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}战争礼赞{/g}或{g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}愤怒颂歌{/g}影响的敌人数量。
languages.original_text: {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} and {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g} increase the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of this bolter by the number of enemies affected by {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 战争礼赞与愤怒颂歌会提高这把爆矢枪的{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}，等同于受战争礼赞或愤怒颂歌影响的敌人数量。

languages.text: 怒りのリサイタルと戦の聖歌により、怒りのリサイタルか戦の聖歌の影響を受けた敵の数だけ、このボルターの{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}が上昇。
languages.original_text: War Hymn and Furious Recital increase the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of this bolter by the number of enemies affected by War Hymn or Furious Recital.

traits.locale_text: 戦の聖歌により、戦の聖歌の影響を受けた敵の数だけ{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}が上昇。

languages.text: {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Himno de guerra{/g} y {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Recital furioso{/g} aumentan la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} de este bólter según el número de enemigos afectados por {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Himno de guerra{/g} o {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Recital furioso{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} and {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g} increase the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of this bolter by the number of enemies affected by {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Himno de guerra aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} de este bólter según el número de enemigos afectados por Himno de guerra.

languages.text: {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Kriegshymne{/g} und {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Inbrünstige Rezitation{/g} erhöhen die {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} dieses Bolters um die Anzahl der Feinde, die von {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Kriegshymne{/g} oder {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Inbrünstige Rezitation{/g} betroffen sind.
languages.original_text: {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} and {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g} increase the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of this bolter by the number of enemies affected by {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Kriegshymne erhöht die {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} dieses Bolters um die Anzahl der Feinde, die von Kriegshymne betroffen sind.

languages.text: {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Hymne de guerre{/g} et le {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Récital furieux{/g} augmentent la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de ce bolter à hauteur du nombre d'ennemis affectés par {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Hymne de guerre{/g} ou {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Récital furieux{/g}.
languages.original_text: {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} and {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g} increase the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of this bolter by the number of enemies affected by {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Hymne de Guerre augmente la {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} de ce bolter à hauteur du nombre d'ennemis affectés par Hymne de Guerre.

languages.text: {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Savaş İlahisi{/g} ve {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Hiddetli Resital{/g}, bu bulonatarın {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}atış hızını{/g} {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}Savaş İlahisi{/g} ile {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Hiddetli Resital{/g}'den etkilenen düşman sayısı kadar artırır.
languages.original_text: {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} and {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g} increase the {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} of this bolter by the number of enemies affected by {g|f:c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}War Hymn{/g} or {g|f:85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}Furious Recital{/g}.
